snippet.title: Reikon Dungeon - 3D Dungeon Crawler with Roguelites features (Kickstarter Trailer)
snippet.description:
Slay & play as vicious enemies in a 3D Roguelike realtime Dungeon Crawler, discover the souls prison mystery and fight it from inside.
You can get the ALPHA here:  http://alcapagames.itch.io/reikon-dungeon
Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1848965716/reikon-dungeon
